name: AI Olympius
description:
Conquer the top of the Olympius of artificial intelligence! Join forces with rebels and their technologies to have a chance to restore freedom in a world that has fallen to the uncontrolled dominance of supreme artificial intelligence, elevating itself to the status of a god. Take up the challenge, test your skills in battling different models of robots, and gradually ascend to the top of Olympius.

You can walk this path alone or in a split-screen co-op with a friend trying to survive in this post-apocalyptic world.

Collect resources and upgrade your weapon and technologies to fulfill various tasks, including assaults, defense, and exploration with elements of survival.
